src_original: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī //
tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /  yaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇīṃ striyamabhiniviśet //
atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate /  nopalabhyate /
kutaḥ punaranayāsārdhaṃ paricaraṇā /  evaṃ vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt //  7. bhagavānāha/
evameva mahārāja balo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet /
saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti /
niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
na dakṣiṇām /  na paścimām /  nottarām /  nordhvam /
tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
evam hi mahārāja caramavijñānaṃ nirudhyate /  aupapattyaṃśikaṃ prathamavijñānaṃ utpadyate /
yadi vā deve /  yadi vā mānuṣe /  yadi vā narakeṣu /  yadi vā tiryagyoniṣu /
tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
tatra mahārāja yaścaramavijñānasya nirodhaḥ /  sā cyutiriti saṃjñā /
yaḥ prathamavijñānasya prādurbhāvaḥ /  sopapattiriti /  caramavijñānaṃ mahārāja nirodhe 'pi na svacidgacchati /
kathaṃ bhagavan kṛtaṃ karma saṃcayaṃ pratirudhya ciraniruddhaṃ maraṇakāla upasthitaṃ manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
